messages.message: in the commercial trial flow [no existing community account], i get this screen. can we not show this screen if there are no projects? also at this point as a user i'm not even aware that i have a "community" account since the trial/create org flow starts immediately after an account is created. this dialog feels misplaced.

Ah I didn't tackle this migrate projects modal in EPD-3528. I only made it so that there was no community trial setup if the customer was trying to set up their commercial trial.
I can implement Siya's recommendation in a new ticket.
In future, if we only implement part of the ticket can we please indicate that? It's hard to track otherwise. I assume we completed everything in this ticket when we marked it as done
I know what we discussed previously with @Serena was that if community usage = 0 by doing a license check then we would skip this screen

> if community usage = 0 by doing a license check then we would skip this screen
@Weiming Wu did you already create a new ticket for what Hannah suggested?
